en.title: [2Q 2025] Mining of Petroleum & Natural Gas
en.description: Quarterly performance of petroleum and natural gas mining, covering prices, production, sales, and employment.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest quarterly mining data, covering prices, production, sales, and employment in the petroleum and natural gas sector.

bm.title: [ST2 2025] Perlombongan Petroleum & Gas Asli
bm.description: Prestasi suku tahunan perlombongan petroleum dan gas asli, merangkumi harga, pengeluaran, jualan dan guna tenaga.
bm.description_email: DOSM baru sahaja menerbitkan data perlombongan suku tahunan terkini, merangkumi harga, pengeluaran, jualan, dan guna tenaga dalam sektor petroleum dan gas asli.
